metadata.title: 5303-1 -- PHP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain scripts. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5303-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  php8.0-fpm - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-enchant - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-xml - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-dba - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-xsl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-mbstring - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-opcache - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-cli - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-snmp - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-phpdbg - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-tidy - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-zip - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-gmp - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-interbase - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-bcmath - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-dev - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-ldap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-soap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-curl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-intl - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-pspell - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-odbc - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-sybase - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-gd - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-bz2 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-mysql - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-readline - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-sqlite3 - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 libphp8.0-embed - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-pgsql - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-common - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-cgi - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 php8.0-imap - 8.0.8-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
